channel.title: Upcoming FreeBSD Events
channel.description: RSS feed of upcoming FreeBSD-related conferences, summits, courses, and other relevant events.

item.title: vBSDcon 2017
item.description: vBSDcon 2017 (http://www.vbsdcon.com), Hyatt Regency Reston, Reston, Virginia, United States 2017 年 09 月 08 - 09 日. This exciting weekend will bring together members of the BSD community for a series of roundtable discussions, educational sessions, best practice conversations, and exclusive networking opportunities.

item.title: BSDTW 2017
item.description: BSDTW 2017 (https://bsdtw.org), Beitou Resort, Taipei, Taiwan 2017 年 11 月 11 - 12 日. BSDTW is a conference that aims to bring out more BSD developers and development all across Asia, drawing speakers both locally and from the entire world. We will gather in Taipei, Taiwan for a mix of developer and user-focused presentations, food, and activities.
